title: 'Easy Ride' launches Nissan into the self-driving market
text:
'Easy Ride' launches Nissan into the self-driving market Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:04 
Nissan Motor Co is taking its first steps to becoming an operator of autonomous vehicle services, hoping to break into a segment set to be dominated by Uber and other technology firms. Zahra Mackaoui reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nissan Motor Co is taking its first steps to becoming an operator of autonomous vehicle services, hoping to break into a segment set to be dominated by Uber and other technology firms.
